title: DAC’s home in a transparent BLOX: OMA’s Ellen van Loon
itunes:title: DAC’s home in a transparent BLOX: OMA’s Ellen van Loon
description: For OMA partner architect Ellen van Loon, a building’s spatial form and the relationship between interior and exterior has always been of great fascination. She joined DAC’s Jen Masengarb to discuss the design process for the BLOX building in Copenhagen – the mixed-building that is also home to DAC – and what happens when she returns to ‘spy’ on the users of spaces she has designed.
content:encoded: For OMA partner architect Ellen van Loon, a building’s spatial form and the relationship between interior and exterior has always been of great fascination. She joined DAC’s Jen Masengarb to discuss the design process for the BLOX building in Copenhagen – the mixed-building that is also home to DAC – and what happens when she returns to ‘spy’ on the users of spaces she has designed.
